WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue's root cause is in Issue 13267
WorkItem.Description:
Dear developer,
 
I use your tool to improve my gearset.
If you look at the Slot Gear / Head you can see that my current head gemming is regarded 3,92 dps to low.
You tool suggests to regem. I gain 10 points of spell power but loose 16 haste. For me there seems to be a mistake.
If I neglect in the calculation the loss of 8 haste by loosing the socket bonus, can understand you result but not now.
 
Yours sincerely
 
MeisterLi, Rat von Dalaran Germany

Comments.Message:
When you mouse over the head slot, does it show a Socket bonus or does it say Socket Bonus: None?  If it says none, try updating your cache from Wowhead, there seems to be a bug with reading socket bonuses from Armory right now.

Let us know if that fixes your issue.

What ebs2002 says is most likely correct, that your item cache does not have the socket bonus.
Updating the cache from Wowhead should fix this.
I have tried to load your xml file in both the dev version and in 2.2.4 but it doesn't load in either, which version do you have this problem with?
This is a duplicate of issue #13267 - it's caused by the same bug.
